name: Afterlife (itch) (Heykiran)
description:
Purpose for player:

Drop the heart on the right place and save the character’s soul.

Gameplay rules:

1.Player has three chances.

2.The heart will be eaten if player drops the heart when character is within the range of bad.

3.The heart will be sent to heaven if player drops the heart when 

character is within the range of good and the heart accurately drops on the right side of scale.

4. Drop the heart by pressing space.

5. Both the boat and the player’s character will moving  left and right.
